page.title: 11North Wood Farm,Boynton
page.content: North Wood Farm has 450 acres of land. It is owned by 2 brothers who employ 1 workman.They grow 182 acres of winter wheat,71 acres of spring barley,42 acres of oil seed rape,10 acres of swedes, 30 acres of temporary grass and 40 acres of permanent grass. They have 4 tractors ,1 combine, a Land Rover and a mini-van . They have a reversible plough and a corndrill, a drag, a back-loader, an elevator, 2 corn trailers and a corn-auger. Each brother has a car.They have just started building a new cornshed so they will have 3 soon and they have 2 straw-barns and 2 fold-yards.They send their cattle to Market Weighton, Driffield and Malton markets.They send their grain to Bradshaws merchants. They have about 27 bullocks, about 236 sheep, 9 pet lambs and 1 labrador dog and 2 sheep dogs.
